name: Mission Prototype (Bramble)
description:
Have a 15-20 minute conversation with your child, using our tool, about “something they have to do” on a daily basis that you find yourself frequently nagging or scolding them about.

Press "Run Game" to start!

What is Bramble?

Our mission at Bramble is to help you and your child have mindful conversations about tough topics. We believe that navigating difficult conversations is a necessary part of building a strong and lasting relationship with your child.

Many parents express frustration when it comes to communicating with their children about daily responsibilities, whether that’s getting ready for school, finishing their homework on time, or putting away their screens. 

Our tool is designed to guide you and your child through a conversation about this topic. It will help you understand your child better so that you can see eye to eye, offer them the support they need, and reach an agreement that both of you are happy with.
